messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] article: Parents, Shopping for Discipline,Turn  to ...
messages.msgSnippet: ... is ... We get some, mostly attitude and tone of voice - fairly easy to ignore.  But I don t think we get nearly as much as people with schooled teens. Tia
messages.messageBody:
>
> Who's unschooling a teenager? Do we actually avoid a lot of the teenage
> rebellion crap because they basically don't have much to rebel against, or
is
> that just wishful thinking on my part?

We get some, mostly attitude and tone of voice - fairly easy to ignore. But
I don't think we get nearly as much as people with schooled teens.
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary
saftety deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...
